group_1.textLeft: Is this...? Am I back to normal again?

group_1.narration: My feeble hope was quashed right away, though,
because I realized immediately@that I didn't have an actual body.
Basically, I'm still inside Hanna;@I'm just using her sense of perception@to make it seem like I'm in the real world...

group_1.textRight: …Aha… You're back, Sena…Ahaha…@Ahahaha…
AAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!
Senaaaaaa!

group_1.narration: It looked like Hanna believed I was a real person,@so she ran and leapt straight at me…

group_1.textRight: Ah, jeez…@What the heck…?

group_1.narration: I explained how I wasn't actually real,@and I didn't have any form...@That I was just an illusion of Hanna's.

group_1.textLeft: In short…I'm an apparition only you can see…@Well, something along those lines?

group_1.textRight: Mmm… So in other words, you're a ghost?
Ahh, figures as much!
You know something?! I had a feeling you were@still around somewhere.
Sure, you turned into a Witch right in front@of me, but it still felt like you were there…
I couldn't find you no matter where I went,
so I thought maybe you went and became some@kinda ghost and were still watchin' over me…
Ahaha, turns out I was dead-on!
But dang, Sena, you're such an ass.
You sure took your sweet time in finally@showin' up.

group_1.textLeft: You're not even questioning my presence.

group_1.textRight: Huh? Didn't I already tell you I had a feeling you@were still around?
I always believed you weren't gone!@Ahaha!

group_1.narration: Hanna had always been so wary and prudent,
and now she accepted this crazy story@without a second thought.
I'm sure it's because…seeing me turn@into a Witch right before her very eyes…@It must have broken her a little.
Not just because she lost me, of course,@but because of the revelation that Magical Girls@turn into Witches, and how our hopes@can be so easily betrayed…
That realization must have been what caused this…@At least, as far as I could unravel.

group_1.textRight: Sena! What're you gonna do next?@The whole world's your oyster!
I already know how I'm gonna end up…ahaha…
AAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!

group_1.narration: Part of me thought that if I could show her@that I was still alive, she'd go back to normal,@but I knew it wasn't going to be that easy...
And besides…could I really say I'm truly alive?

group_1.textLeft: A ghost… Maybe not quite that, but something@close…

group_1.textRight: …Hm? What's up?

group_1.textLeft: Well, it's just…even though I seem like a ghost,@I'm still here.

group_1.textRight: Hmm…
Still, you can disappear as you please,@and you're free to do whatever you want…
AHAHA! It's AMAZING!
…Naw, I see. You hate it.
C'mon, you were sooo obsessed over@your family and school and shit.
And where'd all that take you? How'd you@end up? Just look at yourself…
…You get what I mean, right?
…Ahaha.

group_1.textLeft: Right at the very end, everything looked@so beautiful, and I felt so positive…
But now I hate everything so much,@and I can't control it...
I feel like it's going to take me completely@off the rails and make me lose myself…

group_1.textRight: Well, in that case…
You were shackled to your daily life at home and@school, strugglin' and strugglin' and strugglin'.
And it never paid off, did it?@No wonder you're so full of hate.
So if you drag this city down into chaos, destroy everything that keeps it goin' like this...
Then all those things that held you back…
…will become meaningless and unworthy@of your hate.
And you'll be free.
Not just from hatred…@but from pain and sadness, too.
And you'll be born again! A fresh start,@free from your shitty daily life!
Happy birthday, Sena!
And that's where your new life'll start!
…I won't let you be erased, Sena.
I'm gonna fuck up this joke of a system.
I think it's the only way we can strike back.

group_1.narration: The sun is falling.@The night is rising.
Maybe everything we do is just a brief flicker@of brilliance before darkness takes us all.
And that's fine.@Because I have Hanna with me.
After being abandoned by god,@we could only thank the devil@for taking pity and saving us,@and giving us this miracle...
